sentence.Network_en: But will it help us understand QED and atomic physics any better?

sentence.Network_en: We propose a scheme for controlled teleportation of arbitrary two - atom state in cavity QED.

sentence.Network_en: It is a important and simple way to generate and manipulate entangled states in cavity QED.
